introduction: SYNOPSISJoon-ha, a novelist in his early 40s writes about his experiences in the Vietnam war and becomes an overnight sensation. He signs a contract with a foreign publisher and goes to Thailand to translate the book. He takes his girlfriend, Ji-yeo, with him. Once they arrive in Thailand, Ji-yeo becomes more devoted to Joon-ha and lavishes him with attention. But all Joon-ha is interested is his work. Ji-yeo tries to get his attention by doing things she does not mean. At this time, Private Park, who is also characterized in the book, appears and tells Joon-ha news of his girlfriend back in Vietnam. Upon hearing the news, Joon-ha kills himself. Ji-yeo finally learns of Joon-ha's true feelings.故事发表在40年代初一部小说，在越南的经验相媲美的作家成为一个受欢迎的作者。与国外出版商和合同，以翻译这本书离开泰国。同时配以非常喜爱jiyeo在这个旅程中的等价物。抵达泰国jiyeo不掩饰自己的激动心情更加重视热junha。但是，只有全神贯注的同等工作。Jiyeo往往不介意，甚至行为的junha的关注。本章bakbyeong junha这是写小说的主角出现在他们面前。老越南义务依照听说他当时的女友junha自杀的新闻和jiyeo知道心脏的junha后悔自己的行为，面向太阳真。
